sentence: “The left will not let the Democrats do what needs to be done with the inflation problem, the energy problem, the illegal immigration problem on the southern border,” said Representative Jim Jordan of Ohio, the senior Republican on the Judiciary Committee.
title: House Votes to Decriminalize Cannabis

title: House votes to decriminalize cannabis

title: House passes bill decriminalizing marijuana; Senate fortunes unclear
